product_name: Salomon Nordic 215 Pro Ski Bag - 3 Pairs
long_description: The fully padded Nordic Pro Sleeve carries 3 pairs of skis plus boots, and contains a protective klister sleev to keep your skis coddled and safe and the rest of your gear wax-free during transport.
short_description: The fully padded Nordic Pro Sleeve carries 3 pairs of skis plus boots, and contains a protective klister sleev to keep your skis coddled and safe and the rest of your gear wax-free during transport.
